name: Idly (2 pcs)
description: Soft, fluffy steamed rice cakes, a staple of South Indian breakfast, served with sambar and chutney.

name: Ghee Roast Dosa
description: Crispy, golden-brown rice crepe roasted with clarified butter (ghee), served with a variety of chutneys and sambar.

name: Chicken Kothu Parotta
description: Shredded parotta stir-fried with chicken, egg, and a spicy masala mix. A popular Madurai street food delicacy.

name: Mutton Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with tender mutton pieces and a blend of exotic spices, served with raita.
